subject: Baseball
NCAA Baseball Championships
lead_paragraph: Sean Hagan pitched into the eighth as St. John’s beat East Carolina, 2-0, in the Charlottesville Regional of the N.C.A.A. tournament, setting up a game with Virginia, the No. 1 national seed.
snippet: Sean Hagan pitched into the eighth as St. John’s beat East Carolina, 2-0, in the Charlottesville Regional of the N.C.A.A. tournament, setting up a game with Virginia, the No. 1 national seed.
